client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

count.description: The total number of Institutions to return.

offset.description: The number of Institutions to skip.

country_codes.description:
Specify which country or countries to include institutions from, using the ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code standard.

In API versions 2019-05-29 and earlier, the `country_codes` parameter is an optional parameter within the `options` object and will default to `[US]` if it is not supplied.
